subject: p18570152
History: Year old man with cough and fever and CLL, r/o pneumonia.
Findings: Single lead pacemaker in situ with the lead tip in the right ventricle. No cardiomegaly. No features of cardiac decompensation. Prominent pulmonary arteries suggesting pulmonary arterial hypertension. No pleural effusion. Consolidation in the left lower lobe.
